data.title: Haim Saban Launches Film Group, Headed to Cannes
data.meta_description: The new studio will look to acquire 8-10 films
data.text:
Haim Saban‘s Saban Capital Group is entering the movie business.

The private investment firm, which specializes in media, entertainment and communications industries, tapped former RLJ Entertainment chief acquisitions officer Bill Bromiley as the president of the new studio. Bromiley will head to Cannes in search of 8-10 film that the studio will then look to distribute with a major distribution partner, with whom “they are currently in talks.”

Also read: Hollywood Donor Haim Saban Defends Anthony Weiner: ‘Stay in the Race’ (Exclusive)

Going forward, Saban Films will look at projects in all stages of production, from script to completed product.

Also read: Cannes Adds 30 Films, Makes Sophia Loren Guest of Honor
